```{r, echo= FALSE}
load('data/means.Rda')

N<- mF[,c(1,2,3,4,7,8,11,12,15,16)]
N[,c(4,6,8,10)]<- round(N[,c(4,6,8,10)])
colnames(N)<- c("Preview", "Degradation", "FFD", "FFD_SD", "SFD", "SFD_SD",   
                "GD", "GD_SD", "TVT", "TVT_SD")

N1<- mF[,c(1,2,5,6,9,10,13,14,17,18)]
N1[,c(4,6,8,10)]<- round(N1[,c(4,6,8,10)])
colnames(N1)<- c("Preview", "Degradation", "FFD", "FFD_SD", "SFD",
                 "SFD_SD", "GD", "GD_SD", "TVT", "TVT_SD")

library(knitr)

load("Output/Dplot.Rda")
load("Output/df.Rda")
load("Output/Dplot2.Rda")
```
